mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANAHR.HR_WK_APPLIBUSI_0 ( YMD, EMP_NO, BUSI_EMP_NO, BUSI_EMP_NM, BUSI_DEPT_NM, BUSI_GRADE_NM, ADDR1, TEL1, FAX1, MOBILE, EMAIL, ADDR2, TEL2, FAX2, ADDR3, TEL3, FAX3, BUSI_EMP_NM_EN, BUSI_DEPT_NM_EN, BUSI_GRADE_NM_EN, ADDR1_EN, TEL1_EN, FAX1_EN, MOBILE_EN, EMAIL_EN, ADDR2_EN, TEL2_EN, FAX2_EN, ADDR3_EN, TEL3_EN, FAX3_EN, FIRST_EMP_NO, FIRST_REGDATE, LAST_EMP_NO, LAST_REGDATE, LAST_IP ) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{emp_no}, #{busi_emp_no}, #{busi_emp_nm}, #{busi_dept_nm}, #{busi_grade_nm}, #{addr1}, #{tel1}, #{fax1}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{addr2}, #{tel2}, #{fax2}, #{addr3}, #{tel3}, #{fax3}, #{busi_emp_nm_en}, #{busi_dept_nm_en}, #{busi_grade_nm_en}, #{addr1_en}, #{tel1_en}, #{fax1_en}, #{mobile_en}, #{email_en}, #{addr2_en}, #{tel2_en}, #{fax2_en}, #{addr3_en}, #{tel3_en}, #{fax3_en}, #{emp_no}, SYSDATE, #{emp_no}, SYSDATE, '' )
